===Overview===
The '''Midas Foundation''' was founded by [[Cosmic Man (Midas) (Earth-616)|Dr. Midas]] as an organization through which he secretly collected or hunted anything from throughout the universe and even other dimensions that he could use for his own gain.{{r|Marvel Boy Vol 2 1}}
